en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of the US states and their capitals.
en-US.name: Classic Movie Musts
en-US.description:
Test your knowledge of classic movies.

Classic Movie Musts asks you questions based on the Classic Movie Must podcast.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Classic Movie Musts" or "Alexa, open Classic Movie Musts" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Include your testing instruction (if any) here
